scripts.yaml: npm run validate && npm run trim && npm run validate-trimmed && mkdir -p Docs && json2yaml floatplane-openapi-specification.json > Docs/floatplane-openapi-specification.yaml && json2yaml floatplane-openapi-specification-trimmed.json > Docs/floatplane-openapi-specification-trimmed.yaml && openapi-generator-cli validate -i Docs/floatplane-openapi-specification.yaml && openapi-generator-cli validate -i Docs/floatplane-openapi-specification-trimmed.yaml
scripts.test-build: npm run validate && npm run trim && npm run validate-trimmed && cd tests && rm -rf FloatplaneAPIClientCSharp && ./generate-csharp.sh
scripts.test: npm run test-build && cd tests/FloatplaneAPIClientCSharpTester && dotnet build && dotnet test && cd ../..
scripts.docs-all: npm run validate && npm run clean && mkdir -p Docs && cp ./static/index.html ./Docs/index.html && npm run docs-trimmed && npm run docs-full && npm run docs-async && npm run docs-copy && npm run yaml
scripts.docs-copy: cp ./floatplane-openapi-specification.json ./floatplane-openapi-specification-trimmed.json Docs/ && cp ./floatplane-asyncapi-frontend-specification.json Docs/ && cp ./floatplane-asyncapi-chat-specification.json Docs/
scripts.docs-trimmed: npm run trim && npm run validate-trimmed && npm run docs-oag-html2 && npm run docs-oag-dynamic-html && npm run docs-redoc && npm run docs-rapidoc && npm run docs-reslate && npm run docs-postman && npm run docs-swaggerui
scripts.docs-full: npm run docs-oag-html2-full && npm run docs-oag-dynamic-html-full && npm run docs-redoc-full && npm run docs-rapidoc-full && npm run docs-reslate-full && npm run docs-postman-full && npm run docs-swaggerui-full
scripts.docs-async: npm run docs-async-frontend && npm run docs-async-chat
scripts.docs-reslate: mkdir -p Docs/ReSlateDocs && cd Docs/ReSlateDocs && reslate init && widdershins ../../floatplane-openapi-specification-trimmed.json -o index.md && reslate build && rm -rf ./site && mv ./_site ./site && cd -
scripts.docs-swaggerui: mkdir -p Docs/SwaggerUI && cp static/SwaggerUI/* Docs/SwaggerUI && sed -i.bak -e 's/floatplane-openapi-specification.json/floatplane-openapi-specification-trimmed.json/g' Docs/SwaggerUI/index.html
scripts.docs-redoc-full: mkdir -p Docs/Redoc-full && redoc-cli bundle -o Docs/Redoc-full/redoc-static.html floatplane-openapi-specification.json
scripts.docs-reslate-full: mkdir -p Docs/ReSlateDocs-full && cd Docs/ReSlateDocs-full && reslate init && widdershins ../../floatplane-openapi-specification.json -o index.md && reslate build && rm -rf ./site && mv ./_site ./site && cd -
